Function Documentation

bool createSFIFDemo (  void   ) 
 

Called by DLL ATTACH_PROCESS to setup all demo objects. This implements what normally is done at the top of main().

Definition at line 213 of file Cpp_Jni.cpp.

bool deleteSFIFDemo (  void   ) 
 

Called when DLL is exiting to cleanup and shutdown all demo and driver objects. This implements what normally is done at the end of main().

int Sim_getSFIFRegs (  long long *  elements,
int  len
) 
 

This returns the SFIF counter statistics. They are only valid if running so startSFIF() should have been called. The returned values are made up.
